languages.text: "Я буду молить Императора о том, чтобы вы передумали, шерин!"

traits.locale_text: "Я буду молить Императора о том, чтобы вы передумали, шерин!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"
languages.original_text: "Я буду молить Императора о том, чтобы вы передумали, шерин!"

languages.text: “我向帝皇祈祷，希望你能重新考虑这个决定，亲爱的！”
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: “我向帝皇祈祷，希望你能重新考虑这个决定，亲爱的！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Rezaré al Emperador con la esperanza de que cambie de parecer, shereen!».
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Rezaré al Emperador con la esperanza de que cambie de parecer, shereen!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「御身が考え直してくれるよう皇帝に祈っているわ、シャリーン！」
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: 「御身が考え直してくれるよう皇帝に祈っているわ、シャリーン！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je prie l'Empereur pour que vous reveniez sur votre décision, shereen ! »
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: « Je prie l'Empereur pour que vous reveniez sur votre décision, shereen ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde zum Imperator beten und hoffen, dass Ihr Eure Meinung ändert, Shereen!"
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde zum Imperator beten und hoffen, dass Ihr Eure Meinung ändert, Shereen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Fikrini değiştirmen umuduyla İmparator'a dua edeceğim şirinim!"
languages.original_text: "I will pray to the Emperor in the hope that you will reconsider, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: "Fikrini değiştirmen umuduyla İmparator'a dua edeceğim şirinim!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
